CustomField.description: JSON array of accumulated supervisor LLM messages across rounds for Supervised workflow mode. Contains user/assistant/tool turns in OpenAI message format. Used to provide full conversation context to the supervisor on each re-invocation. Truncated with a rolling window when it exceeds the field limit.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Accumulated supervisor conversation history as JSON. Only used in Supervised workflow mode.
CustomField.label: Supervisor History
